title: Are companies such as Google or Amazon becoming a monopoly? - Quora

response.answer_text: They have monopolies, yes. But the idea is that monopolies are a good thing. The theory is that having a monopoly is the only thing that motivates people. Nobody would ever do anything if they cannot get a monopoly at the end. Especially not anything new. So we need to give people a monopoly over things, so that they will generously agree to do business. This type of monopoly is called a patent, because “monopoly” has negative connotations.
